title: (x) "Revolutionary Road" movie logo grotesque - House Chalet {Stephen}
content:
Can someone identify the typeface used in the promo materials for the new film "Revolutionary Road"? The trailer is here: [http://www.apple.com/trailers/paramount\_vantage/revolutionaryroad/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120719013557/http:/www.apple.com/trailers/paramount_vantage/revolutionaryroad/ "http://www.apple.com/trailers/paramount\_vantage/revolutionaryroad/")

I assume it's something like Helvetica Rounded
author: derl

comments.content: I'm going to go with [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20120719013557/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chalet) Paris 1960.
